subject: Missing order
description_text:
Hi I placed an order almost a month ago and have yet to receive it. I have attached a photo of the tracking I received and for some reason it was being returned. Can someone please help sort this out?
Thank you, Joe 


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hello, I noticed your package was returned. Please verify your address information:  Joseph Noonan  1363 NH Route 175  Apt 2  Campton, NH 03223  United States  +1 603-236-9093

Hi yes that is the correct mailing address.
Thank you,
Joe 


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

Hi is there any update to this order or will I be receiving a refund if I already haven’t, I can’t recall what card was used to track the refund if it was issued.Thank you,Joe


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

Is there any update on this order or refund?

Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone


Begin forwarded message:
Hi joe noonan,    We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from our 8-day holiday. We will investigate the reason for the return and resend your order as soon as possible.
